speech.0: On behalf of the General Assembly, I wish to thank the President of the Republic of Colombia for the statement he has just made. Mr. Alvaro Uribe Velez, President of the Republic of Colombia, was escorted from the General Assembly Hall. Mr. Choquehuanca Cespedes (Bolivia), Vice- President, took the Chair. strength Address by Mr. Valdis Zatlers, President of the Republic of Latvia
